article_title: Whatâ€™s the latest on Israel-Gaza war?
sentence: As  we  approach  five  months  of  fighting  in  the  Israel-Gaza  war,  let's  take  a  look  at  some  of  the  most  recent  developments:  At  least  29,700  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  the  war  began,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
